text:
(1)
Fourth Ave., west side, from and including 17th Street, to, but not including Prospect Ave. The view also shows 17th Street, north side, from and including Fourth Ave., to, but not including Third Ave. This view shows the Samaritan Hospital before it was renovated.
July 4, 1930.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)
The Samaritan Hospital, viewed from another angle, showing the hospital after it has been renovated three years later.
October 11, 1933.

P. L. Sperr.

Fourth Ave., west side, from and including 18th to, but not including 17th Streets. Also shown is 18th Street, north side, from and including Fourth, to, but not including Third Aves. The view shows a frame house at 622 Fourth Ave.

July 4, 1930.

P. L. Sperr.

Brooklyn
17th St. w. from 4th Ave.
10-29-41

P.L. Sperr

Kingsboro Houses on right
